original_title: Banded Together: The Boys from Glen Rock High
overview: In the small town of Glen Rock, New Jersey, 25-miles and a world away from New York City, a group of friends from high school form a band to live out their adolescent dreams. From their unassuming high school auditorium to the main stage of the Tonight Show with Conan O’Brien, the musicians – Jimmy, Lee, John, Jerry, Frank, Jeff, Floyd, and Doug –are playing today at the highest levels of the music industry. BANDED TOGETHER is a remarkable story of a true band of brothers, a group of close friends from high school who bonded through music.--Montclairfilm
title: Banded Together: The Boys from Glen Rock High
